periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 75 in the afternoon. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 3am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 3am and 4am, then patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. South wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 76. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms Likely then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 7pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 62. North wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 75. North northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Clear
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 55. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 78. North northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
